DataSource.Query: SELECT SUM(checkout_detail_view.amount) AS total_amount, SUM(COALESCE(checkout_detail_view.discount, 0 )) AS total_discount, SUM(CASE WHEN items.is_taxable_item = 1 THEN COALESCE(checkout_detail_view.tax, 0) END) AS total_tax, SUM(checkout_detail_view.amount) - SUM(COALESCE(checkout_detail_view.discount, 0 )) + SUM(CASE WHEN items.is_taxable_item = 1 THEN COALESCE(checkout_detail_view.tax, 0) END) AS net_sales FROM sales.sales_view LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_detail_view ON checkout_detail_view.checkout_id = sales_view.checkout_id LEFT JOIN account.users ON users.user_id = sales_view.salesperson_id LEFT JOIN inventory.items ON items.item_id = checkout_detail_view.item_id LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = checkout_detail_view.transaction_master_id WHERE users.user_id = @UserId AND transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND transaction_master.office_id = @OfficeId AND users.deleted = 0 AND items.deleted = 0 AND sales_view.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To;

SELECT TOP 10 items.item_name, SUM(checkout_detail_view.amount) AS amount, SUM(checkout_detail_view.discount) AS discount, SUM(checkout_detail_view.tax) AS tax, SUM(checkout_detail_view.total) AS total_sales FROM sales.sales_view LEFT JOIN account.users ON users.user_id = sales_view.salesperson_id LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_detail_view ON checkout_detail_view.checkout_id = sales_view.checkout_id LEFT JOIN inventory.items ON items.item_id = checkout_detail_view.item_id LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = checkout_detail_view.transaction_master_id WHERE users.user_id = @UserId AND users.deleted = 0 AND items.deleted = 0 AND transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND transaction_master.office_id = @OfficeId AND sales_view.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To GROUP BY items.item_name ORDER BY total_sales desc;

SELECT items.item_name, SUM(checkout_detail_view.amount) AS amount, SUM(checkout_detail_view.discount) AS discount, SUM(checkout_detail_view.tax) AS tax, SUM(checkout_detail_view.total) AS total_sales FROM sales.sales_view LEFT JOIN account.users ON users.user_id = sales_view.salesperson_id LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_detail_view ON checkout_detail_view.checkout_id = sales_view.checkout_id LEFT JOIN inventory.items ON items.item_id = checkout_detail_view.item_id LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = checkout_detail_view.transaction_master_id WHERE users.user_id = @UserId AND users.deleted = 0 AND items.deleted = 0 AND transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND transaction_master.office_id = @OfficeId AND sales_view.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To GROUP BY items.item_name;
